name: The Armclaw Experiment
description: Use your arm hooks to swing around a procedurally generated city in VR!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad-Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: None
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad-Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: None
